page.description: Draws a box around one or more cells of the Xdialog grid.

argument.name: Columns
argument.description: Numeric. The number of columns for the frame to surround.

argument.name: Rows
argument.description: Numeric. The number of rows for the frame to surround.

argument.name: Text
argument.description: Character. Optional. The title of the frame.

section.title: Discussion
section.description: The {BLUEFRAME} command draws a box around one or more cells of the Xdialog grid. The frame color is the standard blue that was used by Windows XP.
